001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionType;
004import java.util.List;
005
006/**
007 * Enum representing different types of table assertions.
008 *
009 * <p>Each entry corresponds to a specific validation check that can be performed on a table.
010 * These assertions ensure data integrity, uniqueness, and expected behavior within table elements.
011 *
012 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
013 */
014public enum TableAssertionTypes implements AssertionType<TableAssertionTypes> {
015
016   /**
017    * Asserts that the table is not empty.
018    * Expected type: {@link List}
019    */
020   TABLE_NOT_EMPTY(List.class),
021
022   /**
023    * Asserts that the table contains the expected number of rows.
024    * Expected type: {@link List}
025    */
026   TABLE_ROW_COUNT(List.class),
027
028   /**
029    * Asserts that every row in the table contains specific expected values.
030    * Expected type: {@link List}
031    */
032   EVERY_ROW_CONTAINS_VALUES(List.class),
033
034   /**
035    * Asserts that the table does not contain a specific row.
036    * Expected type: {@link List}
037    */
038   TABLE_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_ROW(List.class),
039
040   /**
041    * Asserts that all rows in the table are unique.
042    * Expected type: {@link List}
043    */
044   ALL_ROWS_ARE_UNIQUE(List.class),
045
046   /**
047    * Asserts that there are no empty cells in the table.
048    * Expected type: {@link List}
049    */
050   NO_EMPTY_CELLS(List.class),
051
052   /**
053    * Asserts that all values in a given column are unique.
054    * Expected type: {@link List}
055    */
056   COLUMN_VALUES_ARE_UNIQUE(List.class),
057
058   /**
059    * Asserts that the entire table data matches the expected data.
060    * Expected type: {@link List}
061    */
062   TABLE_DATA_MATCHES_EXPECTED(List.class),
063
064   /**
065    * Asserts that a given row is not empty.
066    * Expected type: {@link List}
067    */
068   ROW_NOT_EMPTY(List.class),
069
070   /**
071    * Asserts that a given row contains specific expected values.
072    * Expected type: {@link List}
073    */
074   ROW_CONTAINS_VALUES(List.class),
075
076   /**
077    * Asserts that all cells in the table are enabled.
078    * Expected type: {@link List}
079    */
080   ALL_CELLS_ENABLED(List.class),
081
082   /**
083    * Asserts that all cells in the table are clickable.
084    * Expected type: {@link List}
085    */
086   ALL_CELLS_CLICKABLE(List.class);
087
088   /**
089    * The data type that this assertion type supports.
090    */
091   private final Class<?> supportedType;
092
093   /**
094    * Constructor for defining the assertion type and its supported data type.
095    *
096    * @param supportedType The class type that this assertion operates on.
097    * @param <T>           Generic type parameter for supported type.
098    */
099   <T> TableAssertionTypes(Class<T> supportedType) {
100      this.supportedType = supportedType;
101   }
102
103   /**
104    * Returns the type of the current enum value.
105    *
106    * @return The current enum instance.
107    */
108   @Override
109   public TableAssertionTypes type() {
110      return this;
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Gets the class type that this assertion type supports.
115    *
116    * @return The supported class type.
117    */
118   @Override
119   public Class<?> getSupportedType() {
120      return supportedType;
121   }
122
123}
